author: cnbc.com
title: AVANGRID Schedules 2018 Financial Update
text:
ORANGE, Conn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- (NYSE: AGR) – AVANGRID, Inc. will be releasing its fourth quarter and full year 2017 financial results on Tuesday, February 20, 2018, before the market opens.
In conjunction with releasing 2017 earnings, AVANGRID, Inc. will host a meeting for the financial community on Tuesday, February 20, 2018 in New York beginning at 8:30 A.M. Eastern time. The event will feature presentations from AVANGRID’s CEO, James P. Torgerson and other members of the Executive team.
Interested parties, including analysts, investors and the media may listen to a live audio-only webcast by accessing a link located in the Investors section of AVANGRID’s website at http://www.AVANGRID.com . Shortly before the webcast, presentation materials will also be posted on this page and an audio replay of the webcast will be available for 30 days following the meeting.
About AVANGRID: AVANGRID, Inc. (NYSE: AGR) is a diversified energy and utility company with more than $32 billion in assets and operations in 27 states. The company owns regulated utilities and electricity generation assets through two primary lines of business, Avangrid Networks and Avangrid Renewables. Avangrid Networks is comprised of eight electric and natural gas utilities, serving approximately 3.2 million customers in New York and New England. Avangrid Renewables operates more than 6 gigawatts of owned and controlled renewable generation capacity, primarily through wind and solar, in 22 states across the United States. AVANGRID employs approximately 6,800 people. For more information, visit www.avangrid.com .
